name: Toval's Tower
description:
One dark night, a strange and mysterious warrior appears near a town beset by tragedy. This town exists in the shadow of a looming tower, controlled by the evil (but whimsical) wizard Toval! Any adventurers who are brave enough to enter the tower and meet their demise there have their souls trapped and twisted, and are forced to wander its unholy halls forever in the form of a monster! Can the unknown warrior with no past save these tortured souls, or are they doomed to suffer the same fate?

- Play as the Spark of Light, a new custom class that wields melee weapons, powerful buffs, and potent Light magic.

- The Spark of Light can be male or female, your choice!

- Sneak up on enemies to get the jump on them, before they see you and chase you down.

- Defeating powerful monsters frees their souls from the tower, making them human again. Recruit these brave adventurers to your party!

- Made in RPG Maker MZ.
